Reviews.Title: Simplicity
Reviews.Author: Nolights "nolights"
Reviews.Content: I own many digital cameras, but this HP product is great.  I love the touch screen, easy to move around to the different features.  The unit is very compact, and the clarity of the pictures is fantastic!  There are no cameras out there with this type of feature pack, 12MP, touch screen that is 3"!  I recommend this product to anyone that wants a great compact camera!

Reviews.Title: Good camera for a great price...
Reviews.Author: Floyd Goodrich "Jim G."
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the wife to carry along with her. I was very pleased with the performance of this camera. I did some side by side tests with my top notch Panasonic FZ35 bridge camera. Considering the FZ35 is a 10 in all comparisons, here are my thoughts on this HP360. Pictures are about an 8, lack a touch of saturation but can be tweaked in Picasa 3. The clarity of the pictures are a 9, very nice. The video is good and gets a 8 as nothing comes close to the FZ35 HD video but this cameras video is very good and has good sound and color. Focuses fairly quickly when zooming video. The features on this camera are extensive and work well such as smile detection. This camera suffers, as all inexpensive cameras do, in the area of low light without flash, very noisy but flash pictures are OK. This is meant to be a fun camera for spur of the moment shots, not for once in a lifetime shots. The touchscreen clears away a lot of button clutter and allows for a big bright clear 3" LCD screen. The menus are easy and laid out well within the touchscreen. I like this camera and think most others will also if used as a "fun" camera and not expecting DSLR results.Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ35 12.1MP Digital Camera with 18x POWER Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD

Reviews.Title: good little camera
Reviews.Author: D. esquivel "daves reviews"
Reviews.Content: i read the reviews for this camera and was bummed cause i ordered it before i read the reviews.but when i recieved my camera and took some pictures and reviewed them on my computer i was like what are these people talking about lol.this camera is awesome the touch screen works like a touch screen supposed to work.i got a i pod touch so i know a good touch screen.u know this camera's battery last a long time to as well.the way this guy was talking on his review about the battery being really bad i thought i was gonna have to recharge the battery ever time i took a picture.nevermind that the battery is very good i took about a 100 pics so far and the battery bar is still on full charge so...i love this camera and recomend it to anyone who wants a good camera for a good price..

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: M.D. Stanford
Reviews.Content: This camera is definitely a good value based on the quality of pictures it takes and also the 3" touchscreen.  It takes better pictures than our older Canon camera (albeit marginally so), so I'm happy with it.  It comes with a separate charger for the lithium battery, but I've found that the battery will charge when the camera is hooked up to a computer or USB charger via the USB cable, so there's really no need to remove the battery from the camera to charge it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY FOR THE MONEY!!!!!
Reviews.Author: L. Suzor "luv2read"
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera.  Have had more expensive cameras but for regular joes like me this is a great camera. Simple to use, love the 3 inch screen size and the ability to touch screen is so much quicker than scrolling. Even my doggy nephew Bailey loves it. I used it for Father's day and got some of the best pics of my dad ever. Uploading is also pretty easy to ur computer.  All in all a GREAT value for the money for a simple photographer.  If u are a serious pic taker then u might not like this but for us everyday average folks this is WELL worth the money!!

Reviews.Title: excelent camera
Reviews.Author: john giardina
Reviews.Content: As a senior,I have no patience for the complexity of the new technolpgy ..so I was greatly surprised at the simplicity of this camera..After finding the cd..(hidden in the packge)..went through the instructions..and found the toucntone a pleasure..For the money this is a great camera..John

Reviews.Title: Nice camera and you CAN find a BATTERY!
Reviews.Author: ConnieMaria
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures.  The tiniest details can be very sharp when enlarged - such as veins in a leaf.  (See my sample pictures.)  It's easy to learn.  You may want to search for the full manual and print it off to learn all the details.One drawback I found is that when trying to slide through the pictures by touching the screen, the pictures don't easily go onto the next one - instead they keep going from picture one to picture two, back to picture one then to two again, and so on.  Quite frustrating.  It also prevents you from wanting to say to someone, "Hey - would you like to see my new 12 mp camera?!"  I don't know if this is a fault of this particular model or if mine is slightly ... lemonish ...?BATTERIES?  CAN'T FIND THEM???  They ARE available on Amazon.com.  I found it and ordered my extra battery, but it did take awhile to find it.  Try typing as much information as you can into "search" such as "LI-ION BATTERY NP-40 FOR HP PB360T & SB360 DIGITAL STILL CAMERA" - it's supplied through CyberTech.

Reviews.Title: This camera is awesome
Reviews.Author: Ma Ignacia Pastenes "Titi"
Reviews.Content: it really went over my expectations. i think the camera is really awesome. is light in weight and thin, and the touchscreen works perfectly. it also has video with sound.this is an amazing camera at an amazing price.

Reviews.Title: spend a little more, get a lot more
Reviews.Author: lust for life
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this little camera but it really falls short of even just a good pocket camera. In ideal circumstances the photos are ok but yourhands are tied when you try to set it up for other shots---i.e. low light conditions, concerts, close-ups and macro settings.Spend $50 more and you can acquire a much better camera.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!! Great Price!!!
Reviews.Author: Vscream
Reviews.Content: Great Camera for the price. The touch screen is great and the editing options are amazing.

Reviews.Title: Ideal point and shoot, ideal price.
Reviews.Author: J. Hyland "History geek"
Reviews.Content: Just what I was looking for, a shirt pocket camera that is simple to operate, automated, and intuitive.  Running in the auto mode, just pull it out and start shooting.  Big 3" screen, easy to find zoom buttons, and good picture to picture response time, even on flash.  All my computers are HP so the camera "speaks" the same language.  It is not a DSLR but just ideal for what I needed at an ideal price.

Reviews.Title: HP- pb360
Reviews.Author: Donald Wood
Reviews.Content: Camera takes great pictures, one drawback LCD very difficultto see out side in bright sunlight.

Reviews.Title: Frequent picture taker
Reviews.Author: Denise Roberts
Reviews.Content: I am known as the official picture taker at every event. The point and shoot of this camera ability is wonderful. I carry this camera every where because of it's compact size, even fits in my clutch purse. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: A máquina é perfeita e faz excelentes imagens!
Reviews.Author: Miguel Leonel dos Santos
Reviews.Content: Achei a máquina muito prática, minha namorada já tirou algumas fotos, inclusive, teve a felicidade de captar a imagem de um esquilo comendo ameixas no jardim da casa dela. Ficaram lindas as fotos e  realmente compensa ter esta máquina fotográfica da HP. Perfeito, super facíl e prático pra mexer com as várias ferramentas.I think the camera is very practical, my girlfriend already took some pictures, even had the good fortune to capture the image of a squirrel eating plums in the garden of her home. The photos were beautiful and really worth having this camera from HP. Perfect, super easy and practical to tinker with the various tools.

Reviews.Title: Capturing Memories
Reviews.Author: missme
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace the old fashioned digital that I had. My main concerns were a bigger screen and a rechargable battery. I got that and so much more. This camera has exceeded my expectations and a I can be confident in not missing a moment of my baby's life due to a dead battery.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Shirley A. Bryant
Reviews.Content: HP 360 touch screen camera - I was thrilled at the prospect of getting this camera.  I was going on vacation to Colorado and was excited about taking pictures because I have not been there since 1970.  I even paid for 2 day delivery so I would have it before I left.  It is okay, I guess.  Battery doesn't last long and it is not as user friendly as I had hoped it would. I bought my teenage granddauaghter a Kodak and she likes it much better than mine.  I had a Panasonic Lumix and I felt I was not using it enough so I gave it to my 21 year old granddaughter, and her pictures were AMAZING and she took twice as many pictures as I did in the same amount of time.  I would not buy this camera again.  You get what you pay for.  I should have just bought disposable cameras. Also, I have contacted Amazon because my camera was missing the 0.8 meter USB cable, but they never responded.  This is my only bad experience with Amazon. This is a great disappointment because the camera does have a lot of storage, but I had to buy a card to record my pictures on so I could get them out of my camera (an unexpected expense).

Reviews.Title: Worst Battery Ever
Reviews.Author: S. Snavely "Charla10"
Reviews.Content: This camera was great until the battery died and wouldn't recharge. The charger is horrible and the battery doesn't fit in it well. I called hp and thye only wauranty the battery for 30 days from purchase.I bought a replacement battery and had the same problem. Won't hold a charge.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE DO NOT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: mlp1212
Reviews.Content: Nothing but problems...battery fails and camera won't stay on. Called Hp and their warranty is very limited. 200 bucks down the hole!

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera I ever purchased
Reviews.Author: Infinity
Reviews.Content: This is the worst camera, I ever purchased. Touchscreen doesn't work as expected. The moment I click to review picture, it freezes. I had to remove battery and put it back to make it work. There is no video out to view pictures on TV. Only plus point with this camera is it has large touch screen.I have returned it less than a week.

Reviews.Title: AVOID THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: J.W.
Reviews.Content: Avoid this camera and save yourself the grief that it has caused me.The battery design is a MASSIVE design flaw.  It may be LIon, but you have to remove it from the camera to charge it.  Somehow, even the cheapest Chinese iPod knockoff can manage in-device charging via USB, but oh no, not HP.  Worse yet, they use a no-name charger that the battery barely fits into (the *slightest* bump dislodges it), provides no charging status indicator (the LED just glows a dumb green for "I'm plugged into the wall!") AND ONE THAT NO ONE SELLS, NOT EVEN HP.  OK, *one* person sells a replacement charger (on Amazon) that I had to buy after the wife threw the orignal away/daughter lost it (toss up).And it seems the replacement charger doesn't work, so I'm stuck with an expensive paperweight.I typically avoid HP consumer products like the plague and this reminds my why I do.There are better cameras out there, ones that use plain 'ol AA batteries.  Buy them instead.

Reviews.Title: Great value. Great pictures.
Reviews.Author: K. Smith
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on this camera before purchasing. I am always reluctant when reading the negative reviews, but I figured the positive ones outweighed them. I figured $80 was worth a try for a camera of this megapixel size. I also liked some of the features too.My camera arrived and I used it immediately. I like how light-weight it is. The pictures came out great. Some were blurry, but it may have been the kids moving that made it this way.I enjoy this camera. It is a great price. Nice to have for taking everyday pictures to capture moments. HP PB360 12 MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch Touchscreen LCD  (Bronze)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kathy Martino
Reviews.Content: Sharp clear pictures.  Easy to use.  Easy to down load pictures on to computer.  Battery long life and easy to charge.  Just love it.

Reviews.Title: It's Amazing! :)
Reviews.Author: American Boy "Mainci"
Reviews.Content: It's amazing camera. This camera takes great pictures and videos. I like it very much.Thank you amazon.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: SnazzyDre
Reviews.Content: this camera worked great it has everything that i wanted in a camera and didnt break the bank

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: MRS. GIVANS
Reviews.Content: THIS IS AN AWESOME AWESOME CAMERA. IT TAKES GREAT PICTURES AND MAKE GREAT VIDEOS. NO FAULTS AT ALL. THE TOUCH SCREEN IS REALLY COOL ALSO.I HAVE ONE FOR ALMOST A YEAR NOW AND I NEVER REGRET PURCHASING THIS CAMERA.IT'S A GREAT CAMERA FOR A VERY REASONABLE PRICE, YOU WON'T EVER REGRET PURCHASING IT!

Reviews.Title: Simply A Great Little Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Joe Bruno Sr. "Fiction and Non Fiction author"
Reviews.Content: I bought the HP PB360 12 MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch Touchscreen just a few months ago and it is absolutely delightful to use. It comes with it's own re-chargeable battery and battery charger, so there's no need to constantly keep replacing the batteries with Double A, or Triple A batteries.The pictures are easily viewed on the 3-inch screen and the transfer to your computer is quite simple.And the camera is so small and light, it's fits easily into your pants, or coat pocket.And at $79, you can't beat the price.Highly recommended.[...]

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: MJ
Reviews.Content: Work great for my husband to take a business trip.  He was able to do some sight seeing one day on a recent trip out of the country.  And this worked great.  The pictures he took were great. Did just what we wanted it to do.

Reviews.Title: Quite bad in my opinion
Reviews.Author: P. Bupachatnaichit
Reviews.Content: Goodhigh def photosquite easy to useBadshort battery lifeoften hangcolor is not good enough compare to cannon point & shootsuggestiontry to look another cam. You will get what you pay.

Reviews.Title: easy to use touch screen
Reviews.Author: Roger B "RB"
Reviews.Content: Excellent Camera 12MP, with facilities to download different content, plug and play. 3-inch touchscreen LCD3x optical zoom, Smile Detection, Blink Detection, and Red-Eye Removal, Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

Reviews.Title: Somehow satisfied
Reviews.Author: Maciek Pedraza Sr.
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert on this matter, but it takes good pictures as well as decent quality of videos. In general, good camara for its price.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: hooah89
Reviews.Content: It was a gift and the recipient liked it. The product is packages in one of those hard plastic clamshell things like the type that you see hanging off the racks in the store. I'd have preferred that it came in a box, especially since it was a gift. The hard plastic packaging made the camera look cheap. Good camera otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Failed
Reviews.Author: D. guishard "97trakin"
Reviews.Content: We took it on vacation and while it took decent pictures. For whatever reason the charger decided to take a dump and the camera started acting up. Turning off whenever it felt like.

Reviews.Title: I love the Touch Screen feature
Reviews.Author: J. R. Wagner
Reviews.Content: I had a Photosmart R937 that I purchased when they first came out in 2006. I used it for many years taking, thousands of spectacular pics including many stop action shots of high speed Formula One motor racing. The touch screen feature especially appealed to me... I'm not good at remembering button functions like on most pocket digital cameras. After five years the Touch Screen finally gave out so I bought a Canon PowerShot ELPH 100HS as a replacement. While the PowerShot is a nice camera and takes superb pics having many functions, remembering the buttons doesn't work for me. Guess I'll sell the Canon PowerShot on eBay and pay up for a new HP with Touchcreen function;it's a bit more expensive but I need something I am able to operate.HP PB360 12 MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch Touchscreen LCD (Silver)

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: D. Dellapenna "Della"
Reviews.Content: I received this camera recently for Christmas and I was happy to receive it. However, this camera came without the instruction dvd for it and the battery was already shot, therefore it couldn't charge after I tried to charge it all day. I was very unhappy with it and could not take any pictures with it for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Does this camera record video????
Reviews.Author: carrie cirino
Reviews.Content: I like this camera for the price I paid for it. I've fiddled around trying to figure out certain things and the one thing I cannot figure out is DOES IT OR DOES IT NOT record? The pictures are nice and I love the big view screen (that was a deal breaker for me) and the touch screen and frame option are so cool. So why is it that I cannot figure out if it videos? The description says it does but no matter what I do I cannot get it into video mode. If anybody can hep me please send in a write up.

Reviews.Title: Very Very Very Bad Quality Photos
Reviews.Author: Sohil Patel
Reviews.Content: Okay I ordered this product a while back and when I actually started using it last week, the quailty of the photos were extreemeely bad. The symbols of what choices you have(sunlight, nightime etc...) have only pictues so there are like 30 pictures but you cant even tell what each of them are. Also this camera is very low quality and according to amazon, it was number one on the bought list. i cant believe this. Sorry but please dont but this product if you are looking  for a decent camera.

Reviews.Title: Looks Great, love the 3" view
Reviews.Author: win
Reviews.Content: Looks Great, love the 3" view, but there are too many extras that pop up when you want to take a picture. The lighting is never right and things change without your control. The thing is smarter than me, I can't figure out how to take a decent picture with it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: staycey
Reviews.Content: the camera works great and i love it. you can see everything so clear. i give it a 5

Reviews.Title: missing info
Reviews.Author: Sylvia A. Wilhide "Turk's eagles"
Reviews.Content: I bought for a trip to Alaska.  It arrived the day before I left.  Figured I could take info book to read on plane.  They do not send one, just a CD.  I prefer to have a manual to look up information as needed.  Battery life is short.  I have already had to replace, it would not hold recharge.

Reviews.Title: nice point and click
Reviews.Author: D. Chung
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an inexpensive high res. point and shoot for my 18 yr. old son (he's brutal on electronics). So far he's happy and hasn't destroyed it!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera!
Reviews.Author: Linda Jones
Reviews.Content: I love my camera.  The pixels are great.  The ease of use is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Really just not very good
Reviews.Author: K. Nelson "engineer mom"
Reviews.Content: I've owned this camera for a couple months now, and i'm quite disappointed with it. I've fiddled around with it a LOT trying to adjust settings and turn out better pictures, but it's just very difficult. It has struggles with focusing often - like it will focus on the background when taking a shot of a person, even in portrait mode, or have a hard time focusing at all or finding a face even when a face is the ONLY thing in the shot. My kids don't have the patience to wait 2 minutes for the camera to focus on them! I particularly don't like that the only options for flash in a couple modes (like child mode and smile capture mode) are no flash or red eye reduction. Red eye reduction is a fine idea but it makes the shot too slow and I can never catch my kids smiles!There are some pros - the touch screen which works great and allows for a lot of options. The camera itself looks sleek and is small.If all you want to take pictures of are groups of people or semi-distant subjects in good lighting this camera is great. However if you want any close shots or pictures of children, find another camera. Basically it comes down to - I wish I would have paid a little more for a camera that was a little better so I could get some good shots of my kids.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Value
Reviews.Author: A. Carling
Reviews.Content: An unbelievably-good camera for the price! The camera has many great features that are easy to find and navigate with the touch screen. I would not suggest using it as a video camera, as the video comes out choppy. I would also make sure you have a very large memory card if you plan to use the highest resolution, otherwise it fills up very quickly.

Reviews.Title: HP PB360 12 MP Digital Camera Review
Reviews.Author: C. P. Goslett "Peter G from NYC"
Reviews.Content: The HP camera is excellent in providing photos. I feel the camera,as supplied, has a couple of drawbacks; firstly, the battery must be removed in order to charge it. I feel this is a bother, and I think a plug on the camera to charge the battery while it is in the camera would be preferable; then the USB cable is far too short  and it has a proprietary end to fit in the camera so you cannot just use another cable; then the viewing screen is no match for a bright sun. You have to guess if the image you shoot is the one you want. I was outdoors shooting exhibitions and competitions and, because I was in the bright sun, I had to guess if what I was pointing the camera at was what I wanted to see; in about a quarter of the images I preserved, I was disappointed. I guess the only was to avoid that kind of problem is to get an SLR camera, or at least one with an optional viewfinder. Other than that, the directions on the touch-screen are really pretty intuitive, and the operation of the device is simple and it does take superlative photos.

Reviews.Title: How to video tape using my HP PB360 12 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: millicent cheese-angus
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but I am not sure how to video tape using the camera.

Reviews.Title: awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: DarkScar26
Reviews.Content: Its the best camera ever!!! its just awesome, the pics are with fantastic definition... I love it!

Reviews.Title: Photo Quality vs Battery Life
Reviews.Author: PpY
Reviews.Content: it takes good photo, touch screen is sensitive.but once it is used to take video, battery died fast.so is a choice of good photo quality and battery life.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Judy Anne Schaub
Reviews.Content: I found this camera easy to use.  The touch screen makes manuvering around this camera quite simple. There are many different picture taking options.  I would recomend this camera for the novice as well as the beginner.  It's small size makes it very portable.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad camera at all
Reviews.Author: D. Justham "Doug Just"
Reviews.Content: I bought this little camera from my son to take to Costa Rica on a mission trip.  I wanted him to have something that would take decent photos, but not be a major issue if he lost it.  I was very surprised how well it worked.  Videos came out really nicely and the photos, while not the quality of my "real" Canon" camera were not bad at all.  While I thought the touch screen was probably a novelty I find it easier to get around and change than menu driven cameras.  Biggest thing with any little camera with a small lens is the more you zoom in the worse the photo gets.  Just a result of the small lens.  This is a great camera for taking wide shots and anything you will not be zooming in more than half way.  If you plan on zooming in long ways, look for a camera with a bigger lens.Pros"  easy to use  really decent photos for point and shoot  fits nicely in pocket, shirt or pants  videos look good  easy navigation and quick changes with touch screenCons"  Battery life is bad with stck battery  Bright sun makes screen almost impossible to see  No view finder, only the screen to use..making sun a killerI have no problem giving this camera my blessing, but do yourself a favor and get a DIGIPOWER 720ma battery Item BP-KD7001..it lasts a lot longer and fits the camera.  DO NOT BUY a battery larger that 720ma..it will not fit the camera.  I bouth mine off the shelf at Walmart and worth it!

Reviews.Title: Worth It
Reviews.Author: loner
Reviews.Content: Worth ItThis little camera is the ideal take-along-in-your-pocket-camera.  It's price makes it worth the risk of losing it and the features are terrific, once you figure them out.  That is the only drawback.  The instructions that come with the camera are .... well minimal is an overstatement.  You are forced to use the CD (provided) loaded into your computer to get off the ground.  (I don't often carry my computer with me when on an outing that will use this camera.)  Once you've learned enuf so that some settings become intuitive, the camera does a good job for the price.loner

Reviews.Title: BETTER THAN EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: J. MURRAY
Reviews.Content: NOT AS GOOD AS A 700.00 CAMERA BUT FAR BETTER THAN WE EXPECTED FOR THE PRICE

Reviews.Title: I love it, great value for a 3-inch touch screen!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Blackstone
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. It handles beautifully, the pictures are great. The touch screen makes it so easy and quick to navigate, far quicker than the usual rocker button. I also like that I can zoom while making a video, though it seems to stop recording briefly while it zooms. The only complaint I have, and it's minor, is that the slideshow switches pictures too quickly and there seems to be no way to adjust the slide show speed. One more complaint is when I review the pictures, there are options at the bottom that obscure 1/3 of the picture while I click from pic to pic and I can't get that to disappear--again, minor.Overall I am extemely pleased, especially at the price and value

Reviews.Title: Lots of Features - Easy to Use!
Reviews.Author: Donald Bishop
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that was small and thin for ease of carrying, a good number of features yet simple to operate, and produced great looking pictures. The HP PB360 ended up covering all of my requirements. I have it now for over a month, and I have used it during two trips. It is super simple to use. It has a lot of advanced functions available if you need them, which you access via the 3 inch touch-screen menu. The LCD display is far better than I expected. The camera is so thin that it allows for very easy stow and carry in most anything, including a shirt pocket! One of the neat features I like is that I can tell it what size/resolution to take the picture in, and one of the options is "HD" mode, where it takes a picture in 1920x1080, which matches my HD computer monitor. Comes in handy when you want to take a shot to use as your desktop background, without having to import the pic into a graphics program to resize it to fit the monitor. It has many other resolutions, megapixels, and quality levels you can pick from quickly and easily.If you want a digital camera that is loaded with features, but you want to keep it simple and have the stuff out of the way until you need them, then I can highly recommend the HP PB360.

Reviews.Title: HP 12 MP Touchscreen Camera
Reviews.Author: Fabio Moises
Reviews.Content: The product looks very nice. It has very good resolution in it's pics. The touchscreen works very well. Overall: For the price it was a very good buy.

Reviews.Title: HP PB360
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. Great for exactly what I purchased it for, take with me around town without the bulk of the digital SLR I have for more serious photos. Snap a shot at the restaurant with family & friends - perfect. Out on the boat for the day with friends - perfect. Great price. Easy to use. Accessories priced in same affordable range. Screen easy to use and navigate. Only negative is can't see the screen in bright light - but that is true on many cameras I've used.

Reviews.Title: Spanish review
Reviews.Author: Gamal Abel Liranzo Tavarez
Reviews.Content: Es una excelente camara para el precio, realmente buena, se siente ligera en las manos pero al mismo tiempo sientes que tienes una pieza de tecnologia compacta y segura, lo cual es bueno, por otro lado el hecho de tener bateria recargable le da un extra bastante atractivo, pues podemos olvidarnos de estar cambiando y comprando baterias para la misma.La pantalla tactil es buena, mucho mejor de lo que realmente me esperaba pero quizas pudo mejorarse algo mas por aqui y por alla. La calidad de la imagen es excelente para un PnS, realmente me sorprendio que HP lograra tanta calidad.Es una excelente camara familiar, facil de llenar que no depende de baterias doble A y que sera facil de usar por toda la familia, una excelente compra que por el precio 79 USD, esta mas que justificada su compra.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!
Reviews.Author: Jho
Reviews.Content: I bought this product with some unknown feeling asking myself if it would be as great as it says.. and guess what.. I am TOO happy of having a new camera.. =DThe video is excellent, the amount megapixels are more than fine for me (I would recommend to buy al so the memory).I really recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: WASTE OF MONEY
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Gould
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking that it would be great. However I was terribly incorrect. Even though this camera has cool features like there touch screen, it takes terrible pictures and some features like the smile recognition doesn't even work.  In addition the battery life last about 5 hours and it takes about 4 to charge it. Finally there camera doesn't even come with directions. All it comes with is a quick review that tells the owner almost nothing.I am Sorry I made this purchase

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: I'm Just Saying "Another-Frugal-Consumer-Sati...
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a few months now and I have to say it's only okay.Granted, it does take decent enough pictures and the touch screen is great, but other negative factors outweigh the good.The battery life isn't great at all. You can take a lot of pictures on a full charge, but if the camera sits for a bit it has absolutely no juice when you go back to it, and it powers off after a few minutes of not being used so it's not like it should drain all the power.Charging the battery is a pain. You have to take the battery out, which isn't a big deal, but the charger is a nightmare. You really have to fuss with it to position it just right to get a charge.Also, you'd think that it would charge from your computer while it's hooked up via the USB cable, but it doesn't.There is NO INSTRUCTION MANUAL with this camera either. If you want to know how to use all the features that come with this model you have to go to the HP website and dig through 64 pages of online info to get anywhere.I do like the voice note recording option though.I only paid $89 for this 12mp camera on a lightning deal, so I guess I can't expect too much.
